Indian, Chinese troops clashed twice in 2022 even as peace talks were onIndian and Chinese soldiers clashed at least two times in 2022 along their Himalayan frontier where they have been involved in a bitter standoff since 2020, according to new details that have emerged from the Indian Army's gallantry award citations. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 07:48:58 GMT RBDNEVOICRPYLCKKH2YROSDM7I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indian-chinese-troops-clashed-twice-2022-even-peace-talks-were-2024-01-17/Krishn Kaushik世界亚太地区
First prosecution witness testifies against Jimmy Lai in Hong KongThe first prosecution witness to testify in a landmark national security case against Hong Kong media tycoon Jimmy Lai said on Wednesday he had been instructed by Lai to call people to join protests in 2019 and draw the attention of western democracies. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 07:47:44 GMT HHUMHRTOVBLJFMEEVO5TKJBXYY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/first-prosecution-witness-testizes-against-jimmy-lai-hong-kong-2024-01-17/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界亚太地区
Tesla cuts Model Y prices in Germany after China price cutsTesla Inc has slashed prices of its Model Y cars in Germany, a week after the carmaker reduced its Model 3 and Model Y prices in China. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 06:22:10 GMT MBX34M4IVRKSRDP2TPAF2TJWJI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-cuts-model-y-prices-germany-after-china-price-cuts-2024-01-17/Hyunjoo Jin商业汽车与交通
China state media races to plant presence in Nauru after switch from TaiwanA reporter from Xinhua landed in Nauru on Wednesday, the first from China's official news agency to step foot on the remote Pacific Islands nation after it ditched Taiwan for China, as Chinese state media raced to build up its local presence. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 06:16:39 GMT DN5Y4AWBTVOXNO4Z4IAN4WIR2I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-state-media-races-plant-presence-nauru-after-switch-taiwan-2024-01-17/Ryan Woo世界亚太地区
Breakingviews: China consumers keep Beijing, and world, on edgeAll eyes will be on China’s consumers in 2024. The economy expanded 5.2% year-on-year in the fourth quarter, thanks to manufacturing. But maintaining the momentum will be tricky as local demand remains weak. Factories are starting to look abroad to cope with overcapacity, which will stoke global trade tensions. How Beijing spurs domestic consumption will be vital. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 04:36:32 GMT V2OORHK6WNKQROUSLKUOTZIIXY https://www.reuters.com/breakingviews/china-consumers-keep-beijing-world-edge-2024-01-17/Chan Ka Sing突破性观点
China says threats of force over Taiwan not aimed at most TaiwaneseChina's position that it will not renounce using force to bring Taiwan under its control is aimed at foreign interference and a tiny number of separatists, but Taiwanese need to be disabused of "biases" against China, the government said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 04:22:51 GMT GHTWF4TP5FMBDCDEXPP3SZYKHI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-threats-force-over-taiwan-not-aimed-most-taiwanese-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
